title: so fiora is getting massive indirect nerfs ( on the pbe )
body:
they are making hydra not able to swap, she was pretty much the primary user of this swap and now has to choose between later on or laning. either way she now has some weaknesses. 

you might not believe this is a very big nerf but fiora constantly switches hydras, its pretty big.

edit: you guys seem to think im against this, im not, just letting you guys know she is being nerfed
